item.description:
Edited 2/24:

Just to be clear, this is a two-night event - Friday and Saturday night

Please plan to arrive between 7:30 and 10PM Friday.  If you are planning another arrival time, just let me know, as several have already.

===============================================

Announcing the Wine in Winter Weekend!

Wine, winter activities, wine, food, socializing and, of course wine!

See attachment to email for details, plus more details coming up as details get firmed up.

Will be held at the Landino's vacation house in Eaton, NH.
item.name: The Wine in Winter Weekend
